Name: Public Safety
Description: A program aimed at protecting people and property through police and fire services, emergency management and enforcement of legislation related to building safety, property standards and animal control, with a view to increasing the safety and security of our citizens.
Target Group: Victims of violenceVictims of disasterVictims of hateVictims of fear

Name: Law Enforcement
Description: A program aimed at protecting people from violence and/or crime through the provision of police services.
Target Group: Victims of violenceVictims of crime

Name: Fire Safety
Description: A program aimed at protecting people and property from accidents and incidents, such as fire, through the provision of fire services.
Target Group: Victims of disasterVictims of accidents
Outcomes: Loss of lives due to firesLoss of property due to fires

Name: Construction Safety
Description: A program aimed at protecting people at or around construction sites.

Name: Transportation Safety
Description: A program aimed at protecting motorists, pedestrians and cyclists from accident and/or injury will navigating public hightways or roards.

Name: Economic Development
Description: A program that focuses on the economic health, diversity and prosperity of our community. It includes the development of physical assets, such as business and/or knowledge parks, and development and management of parking sites and structures.
Actualized Result: Focused economic growth, stability and prosperity.

Name: Business Development
Description: A program aimed at supporting the development of businesses, by providing support to those businesses that have the potential to grow, to invest and to hire employees.

Name: Tourism
Description: A program aimed at attracting tourists in support of the local business economy, including hotels, tourist attractions and retail trade.
Actualized Result: Thriving hospitablity industry and retail sector

Name: Immigration
Description: A program aimed at encouraging foreigners to come to the municipality, to invest, to work, to share cultural differences, and to provide skilled labour.

Name: Property Development
Description: A program aimed at encouraging property owners to develop their properties, maintain / increase property values and to do so in compliance with applicable legislation, by-laws and regulations.

Name: Social Support
Description: A program that supports the needs of vulnerable populations.

Name: Housing
Description: A program that provides housing to vulnerable populations.

Name: Child Support
Description: A program that provides supports to vulnerable children.

Name: Employment Support
Description: A program that provides supports to the unemployed or the underemployed.

Name: Public Health
Description: A program that aims to protect the health of people.

Name: Disease Prevention
Description: A program that aims to prevent disease from affecting people.

Name: Long-Term Care
Description: A program that cares for seniors and physically challenged individuals.
Actualized Result: Care for seniors and physically challenged individuals

Name: Chronic Health
Description: A program that cares for people with serious illnesses.

Name: Sexual Health
Description: A program that encourages people to take sexual precautions.
Actualized Result: Elimination / reduction of sexually transmitted disease

Name: Education
Description: A program that provides opportunities for people to learn, to develop skills and to live independent lifestyles.

Name: Library
Description: A program that provides opportunities for people to learn, to develop skills and to live independent lifestyles in a library setting.

Name: Transportation
Description: A program that focuses on the movement of people and goods through the delivery of appropriate infrastructure and multi-modal opportunities for motorized and non-motorized movement.
Actualized Result: A safe, multi-modal transportation system with varied opportunities for movement of people and goods.

Name: Community Development
Description: A program that aims to achieve a socially progressive and diverse community that offers abundant social and cultural enrichment opportunities, and the opportunity to live a healthy and active lifestyle.
Actualized Result: A socially progressive and diverse community guided by comprehensive, sustainable community planning offering varied opportunities for cultural enrichment and active living.

Name: Leisure / Recreation
Description: A program that aims to engage people in active living pursuits.

Name: Culture / Heritage
Description: A program that aims to offer cultural and heritage opportunities.

Name: Heritage
Description: A program that preserves the history of a community.

Name: Arts
Description: A program that provides access to art as an expression of the community.

Name: Justice
Description: A program that provides fair and just treatment.

Name: Employment
Description: A program that focuses on offering employment supports and choices.

Name: Environmental Protection
Description: A program that focuses on the environmental health and vibrancy of the community’s natural assets and how they interface with the built environment.
Actualized Result: A community that respects its natural environment, minimizes its environmental impact, and adapts to and mitigates climate change.

Name: Governance and Civic Engagement
Description: A program that encompasses the values and processes through which Council works with an engaged citizenry to ensure decisions meet the common good and reflect the values/needs of the community.
Actualized Result: Vision, leadership and decision-making for the common good, generated by an informed and engaged community working in collaboration with City government
Source: Reference Model Working Group - September, 2011.  Note: description and goal provided by City of Fredericton.

Name: Corporate
Description: A program that encompasses the collaborative and corporate efforts of the organization to plan, finance and support municipal assets, infrastructure and service adelivery.
Actualized Result: Municipal services, assets and infrastructure planned, financed and supported in a sustainable manner.

Name: Financial Management
Description: A program that accounts for the funds required to operate a municipality.
Actualized Result: Sufficient funds to deliver programs and services

Name: Human Resource Management
Description: A program that manages the lifecycle of human resource needs of a municipality.
Actualized Result: Sufficient skilled human resources to deliver programs and services

Name: Asset Management
Description: A program that sustains the assets required to provide municipal services.
Actualized Result: Sustainable assets to deliver programs and services

Name: Information Management
Description: A program that enables information to be accessed from the most current, accurate source available.
Actualized Result: Accessible information to deliver programs and services
